message.content:
I need to identify the net amount of cash and cash equivalents generated from investing activities, along with its component sub-items.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see the "Cash Flow from Investing Activities" section which contains:
- Purchase of Fixed Assets: 0.00
- Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities: -0.00

The negative sign before the zero for "Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities" indicates outflows, but since the value is 0.00, the actual net cash flow from investing activities is -0.00 (or simply 0.00).

The only sub-item contributing to this is "Purchase of Fixed Assets" with a value of 0.00.

In the example, the sub-item was listed with its positive value even though it contributed negatively to the net cash flow from investing activities. Following the same pattern, I'll include the sub-item value as 0.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-0.00', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '0.00'}}}
```
